Headline: Yellow Line Service Temporarily Suspended
ShortDescription: Service on the Yellow Line continues to be temporarily suspended following an incident at Howard.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Service on the Yellow Line continues to be temporarily suspended following a recent incident at Howard.

Shuttle bus service is available between Howard and Skokie/Dempster, serving all affected stations during normal hours of operation.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines. These may include the #97 Skokie bus route.

We are working to restore service as soon as possible. We apologize for the inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Delays Affecting Loop-bound Pink Line Trains
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Pink Line trains are experiencing delays leaving 54th/Cermak. Expect longer than usual wait times. Crews working to restore normal service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Pink Line trains are experiencing delays leaving 54th/Cermak. Expect longer than usual wait times.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as using the #21 Cermak bus as alternate service. 

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Howard-bound Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: Some Howard-bound Red Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier delay at 95th. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Some Howard-bound Red Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier delay at 95th.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
